= Xfce4-configuration-flie-directories =

*In .config directory:*
.config/autostart
.config/Thunar
.config/Xfce4
.local/share/xfce4

*Note that there's a global set of configuration files in*
/etc/xdg/xfce4
/etc/xdg/Thunar
/etc/xdg/menus

tar vfcz xfce4.backup.tar.gz .config/autostart .config/Thunar .config/Xfce4 .local/share/xfce4 /etc/xdg/xfce4 /etc/xdg/Thunar /etc/xdg/menus
